content.description: Pimp some thin edges past three bolts to a seam which travels up the wall passing more bolts, then finish on the last 4 bolts of Evenflow.
Climb from anchor to bolt out right (instead of climbing straight up onto Crosstown Traffic) and follow the line out right 3 bolts till you climb a flake and the upper headwall (crux).
content.location: If approaching from the creek, once you cross creek, climb the first 4 bolts of Evenflow and traverse left 80' across the ledge to an anchor. Belay here.  From this anchor climb up (cruxy) and angle right.

content.description: Climb just right of where the arete touches the ground.  Follow three bolts to a shelf and follow both sides of the arete to the headwall finish
content.protection: QD's, runners to extend at the two overlaps.
content.location: First route as you cross the creek.

content.description: Bolted route directly above the ledge anchor (approached either by rapping into the cliff or by climbing to the 4th bolt of Evenflow and traversing the shelf to the bolted anchor). Climbs a bouldery start to a crunchy face to a tech face which traverse up and right. Anchors are on top of the block on top of the wall. Chain is needed at the time this is written.
content.protection: 10 bolts or so plus anchor (.75 Camelot helpful before first bolt)
content.location: So far this is the left most route on the wall. Angling right from the same anchor is Full Circle.
